summary: Attorney with 25+ years of experience in contracts, divorce mediation, elder care, employment, estates, family law, probate, property law, trusts, and wills; strong mediator, negotiator, and advisor in business transactions; founder/director of mediation programs; skilled in research, writing, and trial preparation.

experience.title: Owner/Attorney and Mediator
experience.description: Gathers evidence to formulate defense or initiate legal actions; interviews clients and witnesses; analyzes evidence and applies relevant laws and precedents; conducts depositions and discovery; determines liability; evaluates information from documents; interviews claimants and witnesses; researches laws and precedents; recommends settlements; prepares briefs and appeals; investigates facts; analyzes outcomes; prepares documents; handles probate wills and estate matters; negotiates settlements; advises clients on business transactions and legal rights.

experience.title: Founding & Initial Director
experience.description: Researched and submitted grant proposals to Cleveland and Gund Foundations. Developed forms and procedures to facilitate mediation. Recruited and trained initial mediators; conducted meetings with disputants; clarified issues and needs; used mediation techniques to facilitate communication and guide parties to mutual agreement; prepared mediation agreements.

experience.title: Assistant Director of Law
experience.description: Advised city departments; gathered and analyzed research data; prepared legal briefs and opinions; filed appeals in state and federal courts; arranged depositions and discovery; supported claims and litigation.

experience.title: Manager, Cleveland, OH
experience.description: Promoted through four progressively larger ladies apparel departments; recruited, interviewed, trained, supervised and, at times, fired staff; managed human resources, merchandising, office procedures, operations and sales.

experience.title: Manager, Assistant, Manager-in-Training
experience.description: Managed and trained staff; oversaw human resources, merchandising, office procedures, operations and sales in ladies apparel.

education.school: Cleveland-Marshall College of Law, Cleveland State University

education.degree: High School Diploma, College Prep, with Honors

certifications: Mediation training (over 100 hours), American Mediation Association
